TopicTitle: A few photos I took while I was on Erin.

Articles.Content:
It wont be long until it's time for Joefal Kerman to return back to Kerbin. Untill then, he decided to snap a few pictures while he did science things on Erin.

Javascript is disabled. View full album

p.s. That eclipse doesn't look right..

Edited November 12, 2013 by CrazedGunman502

Ah very nice. Im using the new planets myself. Landed on Ascension and Inaccessible so far. A Sentar grand tour is next ( god help me ). I gotta ask.. how in the hell did you perform the ejection burn? The only way I can imagine it is getting lucky with a window that falls on an An/Dn node. Then launching at the right angle.
